response:
Welcome, Sarah! I'm Voyaj, your helpful trip coordinator. Let me take a look at where we're at so far. 

Here's where we are: ✅ 1 member (Sarah) | ⏳ Destination, dates, and budget not set yet. My plan is to get us started by gathering destination ideas from everyone - so go ahead and suggest your top spots! I'm tracking that the budget is still pending as well, we'll get to that next. If you have any other preferences, feel free to share those too. Looking forward to planning this trip with you!
